Katherine Stehberg

La Reina (56) 962052499· kstehberg@gmail.com

Multidisciplinary professional with a solid track record in business management and administration, digital marketing, and web design. Expert in public relations and communication, with skills in teaching and coordinating educational projects. With extensive experience in the education industry, I have worked with international and local organizations, including the United Nations and Save the Children. I stand out for my proficiency in multiple languages, including Spanish, English, and Portuguese, allowing me to communicate and collaborate effectively in international environments. My experience spans successful planning and execution of marketing strategies, warehouse management, event coordination, as well as the development of training programs. I have demonstrated notable achievements, such as increasing sales by 300% and positioning businesses within the local community. My ability to automate processes and my experience in leading teams have enabled me to achieve business goals and foster client loyalty. Furthermore, my academic background includes a Bachelor's degree in Social Communication, a Master's degree in Environmental Management, and specialized courses in marketing and development. Furthermore, my studies in Ancestrology healing/Psychology provide a unique perspective on human behavior and emotions. This knowledge can be applied to improve chatbot speech by enhancing their understanding of user intent, allowing for emotionally intelligent responses, and ultimately creating a more satisfying user experience. My passion for communication, business development, and education drives me to seek exciting challenges where I can apply my diverse skill set and contribute to organizational success. Open to new collaborations and connections, I'm committed to making a positive impact in the professional realm.

Interests

My interests span a diverse range of activities that reflect my passion for creativity, expression, and exploration. As an avid web enthusiast, I find joy in designing websites, where I leverage my technical skills to create visually appealing and functional online spaces.

Beyond the digital realm, my love for singing provides me with a means of emotional release and artistic expression. Whether it's belting out tunes or harmonizing with melodies, music serves as a constant source of inspiration in my life. Additionally, my adventurous spirit finds fulfillment in the hobby of traveling, allowing me to immerse myself in different cultures, discover new landscapes, and broaden my perspective. These hobbies collectively embody my commitment to innovation, artistic pursuits, and a curiosity-driven exploration of the world around me.
